Title: Allows prescriptions for controlled substances to be issued for greater than a thirty-day supply during a state of emergency
Summary: Relates to allowing prescriptions for controlled substances that are normally restricted to a thirty-day supply to be issued for greater than a thirty-day supply during a state of emergency.
LawCode: Amd ยง3332, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to allowing prescriptions for controlled substances that are normally restricted to a thirty-day supply, to be issued for greater than a thirty-day supply during an emergency
